main_title: Welcome to the World of Colors
description: Discover a unique collection of luxury paints and colors, where quality meets creativity. We provide innovative and comprehensive painting solutions that meet all your interior and exterior design needs, ensuring elegance and precision in every touch.
cart_empty_message: Add products to cart to continue
favorites_empty_message: Start adding colors you like to your favorites list
company_description: A leading company in high-quality paints and colors, providing innovative and advanced solutions for all your painting and decoration needs.
intro_paragraph_1: At Bondmaxx, we don't just sell paints, we provide colors that transform your world. Specializing in interior, exterior, automotive, and marine coatings, we turn every space and surface into a reflection of your taste and ambition.
intro_paragraph_2: Using the latest technologies and high-quality materials, we deliver finishes that are not only vibrant and exceptionally durable, but also environmentally friendly. Bondmaxx is your partner in protection and beauty, ensuring your projects stand the test of time and refined taste.
elevate_experience: Don't just change the color, elevate your experience
industries_description: We provide specialized and innovative painting solutions for various industries and sectors, ensuring the highest standards of quality and performance
residential_description: Advanced painting solutions for homes, apartments, and villas with guaranteed quality and elegance
commercial_description: Painting commercial buildings, offices, and shopping centers with the latest technologies
industrial_description: Specialized painting solutions for industrial facilities and factories resistant to harsh conditions
marine_description: Painting ships and marine facilities with corrosion and saltwater resistant technologies
ready_to_transform: Are You Ready to Transform Your Project?
cta_description: Contact us today and discover how professional painting solutions can make a difference
search_placeholder: Search for color family or code...
no_results_message: Try changing your search term or selecting a different color category
collection_description: The BONDMAXX 2025 color collection, named 'Harmony', celebrates the effect of subtle shades and perfect harmony. The collection includes over 360 colors distributed across six main color categories, each carefully designed to meet the finest aesthetic and functional standards.
exterior_description: Protect your home's facade with the best exterior paints from BondMax. A diverse range of weather-resistant paints, with long-lasting colors that give your facade a distinctive modern look.
bondmax_ultra_description: Maximum protection against harsh weather conditions.
bondmax_modern_description: A modern touch for your home's facade.
insulation_description: Protect your home or office with the best insulation solutions from BondMax. A diverse range of thermal and acoustic insulation to ensure high comfort and efficiency.
thermal_bondmax_premium_desc: Maintains optimal temperature inside the building.
thermal_bondmax_villas_desc: Maintains coolness in summer and warmth in winter.
interior_description: Shop BondMax products. Discover our diverse range of high-quality paints and choose colors that add protection and beauty to your walls at the same time.
page_not_found_message: Sorry! The page you are looking for does not exist.
services_page_title: Renew Your Home with Our Services Easily
services_page_subtitle: Book a professional painter to define any space or request paint delivery to your home. All this you can do from the comfort of your home.

default_description: Makes your home come alive at every moment, covering every wall the way you want, where beauty and life become a lifestyle.

faq_question_1: How do I know the nearest store to me?
faq_answer_1: Use the 'Use My Location' button or enter your city name in the search box to find the nearest store.
faq_answer_2: Yes, most of our stores offer free delivery service for orders that exceed a certain value.
faq_answer_3: We accept cash on delivery, credit cards, and bank transfer.
faq_question_4: Can I get a free consultation?
faq_answer_4: Yes, all our stores offer free consultations from paint experts to help you choose the right product.
